font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 监禁，困于…之中： to confine in a restricted and often crowded area
【例】 Those restless kids were cooped up in the house on a rainy. 雨天那些好动的孩子们被困在房子里
【近】 box, cage, corral, encage, enclose, envelop, fence, hedge, immure, include, pen, wall
【反】 free, liberate, release 释放

【记】 cop 警察，抓住；小心警察把你抓到笼子里，象鸡笼子般
